import sys;

def main():
	tc=int(raw_input());
	for x in range(tc):
		noc=int(raw_input());
		stinp=str(raw_input());
		newst=str();
		nor=len(stinp) / noc;
		for y in range(nor):
			if y%2!=0:
				for c in range(noc-1,-1,-1):
					ind=y*noc+c;
					char=stinp[ind];
					newst=newst+char;
			else:
				for c in range(noc):
					newst=newst+stinp[y*noc+c];
					
		#print newst;
		#now extract
		final=str();
		for x in range(noc):
			for y in range(nor):
				final=final+newst[y*noc+x];
		print final;	
if __name__=="__main__":main();
